alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Cherokee; Greenwood; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:26PM EDT until August 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rutherford County in western North Carolina... Southern Cleveland County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... South central Gaston County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Western York County in Upstate South Carolina... Central Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... East central Abbeville County in Upstate South Carolina... Union County in Upstate South Carolina... Central Greenwood County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 625 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Forest City to 13 miles southwest of Laurens, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Greenwood, Gaffney, Laurens, Union, Kings Mountain, Clinton, South Gastonia, Woodruff and Boiling Springs NC. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Cherokee; Greenwood; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union; York
